message_1: Suppose you need to send a secret message "HELLO" to your friend using the one-time pad encryption method. Your friend has a key of "WORLD". Using the ASCII code, what will be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO" using the one-time pad encryption method with the key "WORLD", we will use the XOR operation on the ASCII codes of the corresponding characters in the message and the key.

Here are the ASCII codes for the characters in the message and the key:

Message: HELLO
ASCII:   72 69 76 76 79

Key:     WORLD
ASCII:   87 79 82 76 68

Now, we will perform the XOR operation on the corresponding ASCII codes:

72 XOR 87 = 23
69 XOR 79 = 18
76 XOR 82 = 30
76 XOR 76 = 0
79 XOR 68 = 19

The encrypted message in ASCII codes is: 23 18 30 0 19
